Plot: This accumulative gift of writings, long, and short-form of styles will perhaps, inspire, encourage, empower, and exhort many who will take the opportunity to read this and other books written by Latonya. This book is full of passionate phrases, and verses that will perhaps, reflect, and honor many areas of African American Life, personal struggles and hardships, from womanhood, manhood to the neighborhoods, this precise definitive compendium will spark the heart and soul of many of LaTonya Page- Balkcom admirers and introduce new readers to this phenomenal woman for the ages. Enjoy, Beloveds
